title: Team FuroX LFP Plt-Dia Elo, along with a possible chance for an experienced analyst!

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Team FuroX (@TeamFurox). Oceanic eSports organization dedicated to player development and the gaming community. Partners:- @JayF_Designs. Australia

body:
We at Team FuroX are currently looking for players to help fill our 2nd team
at the moment, we are looking for:
**Top Lane
Mid Lane
Support
ADC**
In your role you should have a decent sized champ pool of at least 3 main champs, as well as a willing to learn, and stay updated with the meta.
You must be able to commit to most nights of the week, for Training, Scrims, and Tournaments
Other requirements include a good Microphone, and a willing to improve and take the game seriously in a team environment
Please do not apply if you are not Plat 2+
for any more information, add Semkosis on League

We are also interested in possibly bringing on an **experienced** analyst!

replies.body: I'd be glad to fill the ADC/MID/TOP position.
ADC main here!! XSirCution - will add you in game

Hey im captain of a team (currently nameless) and i have a full team (except mid laner still lf) incuding coach and was wondering if you'd like to intergrate my team under your org
Could you add me on league to discuss further :) -Hasm
